tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audit_trails (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE examination (
  exam_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  examiner_name VARCHAR(100),
  agency VARCHAR(100),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE audit_trail (
   audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   action_type VARCHAR(50),
   action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE examination (
   examination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   audit_id INT REFERENCES audit_trail(audit_id),
   examiner_name VARCHAR(100),
   examination_date DATE,
   findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigation (
   investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   audit_id INT REFERENCES audit_trail(audit_id),
   investigator_name VARCHAR(100),
   investigation_date DATE,
   outcome TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_body (
   regulator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   regulator_name VARCHAR(100),
   region VARCHAR(50),
   contact_person VARCHAR(100),
   contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_log (
   log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   audit_id INT REFERENCES audit_trail(audit_id),
   log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   message TEXT
)
